ai-sn27:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for the eye,
ai-sn27:1.1.3_0: or desire and greed for the mind.
ai-sn27:1.1.4_0: or nose contact is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:1.1.5_0: or the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-sn27:1.1.6_0: or desire and greed for the body,
ai-sn27:1.1.7_0: or mind is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:1.1.8_0: When a mendicant has given up mental corruption in these six cases, their mind inclines to renunciation.
ai-sn27:1.1.9_0: An end of renunciation, the direct knowledge of the things to be realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:1.1.10_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-sn27:2.1.3_0: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of sounds,
ai-sn27:2.1.7_0: or thoughts is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:2.1.8_0: When a mendicant has given up mental corruption in these six cases, their mind inclines to renunciation.
ai-sn27:2.1.9_0: An end of renunciation, the direct knowledge of the things to be realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:3.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for eye consciousness,
ai-sn27:3.1.7_0: or mind consciousness is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:3.1.8_0: When a mendicant has given up mental corruption in these six cases, their mind inclines to renunciation.
ai-sn27:3.1.9_0: An end of renunciation, the direct knowledge of the things to be realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:4.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for eye contact,
ai-sn27:4.1.7_0: or mind contact is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:4.1.8_0: When a mendicant has spoken in these three ways ...
ai-sn27:4.1.9_0: I am realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:5.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for feeling born of eye contact,
ai-sn27:5.1.7_0: or feeling born of mind contact is a defilement of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:5.1.8_0: When a mendicant has spoken in these three ways ...
ai-sn27:5.1.9_0: I am realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:6.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for perception of sights,
ai-sn27:6.1.7_0: or perception of thoughts is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:6.1.8_0: When a mendicant has spoken in these three ways ...
ai-sn27:6.1.9_0: I am realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:7.1.7_0: or intention regarding thoughts is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:7.1.8_0: When a mendicant has spoken in these three ways ...
ai-sn27:7.1.9_0: I am realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:8.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for craving for sights,
ai-sn27:8.1.7_0: or craving for thoughts is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:8.1.8_0: When a mendicant has spoken in these three ways ...
ai-sn27:8.1.9_0: I am realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:9.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for the earth element,
ai-sn27:9.1.3_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the water element,
ai-sn27:9.1.4_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the fire element ...
ai-sn27:9.1.7_0: or the consciousness element is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:9.1.8_0: When a mendicant has given up mental corruption in these six cases, their mind inclines to renunciation.
ai-sn27:9.1.9_0: An end of renunciation, the direct knowledge of the things to be realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:10.1.2_1: or consciousness is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:10.1.3_0: When a mendicant has given up mental corruption in these five cases, their mind inclines to renunciation.
ai-sn27:10.1.4_0: An end of renunciation, the direct knowledge of the things to be realized by direct knowledge.”
ai-sn27:10.1.6_0: The first sub-chapter on corruptions is finished.
ai-sn27:10.2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on corruptions are complete.
